name: Dev Data
description: WipfliDefault: Holds un-aggregated Development/Test data - usually stored in QVD format.

folders.name: Raw
folders.description: Data exactly as extracted from the source system unmodified

folders.name: Combined
folders.description: Conformed and merged data from multiple source systems

name: Dev Transform
description: WipfliDefault: Holds Fact and Dimension tables ready for use by the business users, Star Schema. All business logic should be applied in this data.

name: Prod Data
description: WipfliDefault: Holds un-aggregated Production data - usually stored in QVD format.

folders.name: Raw
folders.description: Data exactly as extracted from the source system unmodified

folders.name: Combined
folders.description: Conformed and merged data from multiple source systems

name: Prod Transform
description: WipfliDefault: Holds Fact and Dimension tables ready for use by the business users, Star Schema. All business logic should be applied in this data.
